description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of magazine films which looks at aspects of West Germany. Looks at the sport of Kendo, the National TV news broadcasts, the town of Hamlyn, a coal fired power station with a sulphur dioxide remover, social stations to mobilise human care and famous young violinist Anne-Sophie Mutter.
